system.description:
You were raised to be cruel. Your Wisdom stat has been replaced by the Iron stat. Iron represents your competitive spirit and cruel heart.

You cannot @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.Ml6muq1ZjhkuT7FF]{Speak Softly} without a Wisdom stat. You cannot choose to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} or @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.3lOlQnDdQRaiR47g]{Talk Sense} with +Wisdom without a Wisdom stat, either.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} by outlasting them in a contest of power or endurance, roll +Iron. On a 10+, they pass out.

This Move cannot be Shared.
